text: Hey, sorry. Just realised I didn't respond. Ye I had a bit of a play around at the start, I made it quite a lot bigger than it was and narrowed the teeth a bit.
I wanted to ask how Linux was going? I'm using Windows and I always see people recommending Linux as it manages ram better.

I want to try installing linux at home, to see how I get on there. But I have noticed a lot less crashes on Linux compared to Windows, and it's handling some pretty heavy sims pretty well, so from what I've seen so far, yeah, I'd agree with others, that it manages its RAM better. We were struggling with 96-125GB of RAM on windows for some really heavy water stuff, but Linux seems to be handling some of that with 64GB
